title: Re commencement of the construction of the Court Complex at Beligaha Junction in Galle
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of Justice, Human Rights & Law Reforms to re commence the partly constructed Court Complex at Beligaha Junction where the construction work has been stopped, after assigning the construction work to the State Engineering Corporation under the consultancy of the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau and to establish the Galle Court Complex at the said premises, was approved by the Cabinet.
